mapper.select: select * from p10_casee left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id where p10_casee.del_flag = 0 and p10_casee.casee_type = #{caseeType} and p10_project_casee_re.project_id = #{projectId} order by p10_casee.start_time desc LIMIT 1

select p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_casee.*,p10_casee_lawyer_re.actual_name as lawyerName,p10_court.court_name,p10_project_casee_re.actual_name as userName from p10_casee left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_project_casee_re.project_id left join p10_casee_lawyer_re on p10_casee_lawyer_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_court on p10_court.court_id = p10_casee.court_id where p10_casee.del_flag = 0 and p10_casee.casee_id = #{caseeId}

select p10_casee.*,substring(JSON_EXTRACT(p10_task_node.form_data, "$.effectiveDate"),2,10) effectiveDate from p10_casee left join p10_target on p10_target.casee_id=p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_task_node on p10_task_node.target_id = p10_target.target_id where p10_casee.del_flag = 0 and p10_casee.casee_type in (2020,2021) and p10_casee.status = 1 and p10_target.goal_type = 10001 and p10_task_node.form_data is not null and p10_task_node.node_key like "%ZZSDQK" and JSON_EXTRACT(p10_task_node.form_data, "$.effectiveDate") is not null

select * from ( select * from ( select p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_casee.*,p10_project_casee_re.actual_name as userName , p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,p10_court.court_name from p10_project left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.project_id = p10_project.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id = p10_project_casee_re.casee_id left join p10_court on p10_court.court_id = p10_casee.court_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_casee.casee_type in (3010,3031) order by p10_project.project_id,p10_casee.start_time desc
limit 999999999999 )casee GROUP BY casee.project_id )casee where casee.status = 4
and casee.ins_id = #{login.insId}
and casee.outles_id = #{login.outlesId}
and (casee.company_code like concat('%', #{query.caseeNumber}, '%') or casee.casee_number like concat('%', #{query.caseeNumber}, '%'))
and casee.executed_name like concat('%', #{query.executedName}, '%')
and casee.actual_name like concat('%', #{query.actualName}, '%')
AND casee.start_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')

select * from ( select p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,casee.*,p10_project_casee_re.actual_name as userName , p10_court.court_name,SUM(p10_payment_record.payment_amount) courtSum from p10_project left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.project_id = p10_project.project_id left join (select * from p10_casee where p10_casee.casee_type in (3010,3031) ORDER BY p10_casee.start_time desc) casee on casee.casee_id = p10_project_casee_re.casee_id left join p10_court on p10_court.court_id = casee.court_id left join p10_payment_record on p10_payment_record.project_id = p10_project.project_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_payment_record.payment_type = 200 and p10_payment_record.status = 0 GROUP BY p10_project.project_id )countList where countList.courtSum != 0
and countList.ins_id = #{login.insId}
and countList.outles_id = #{login.outlesId}
and (countList.company_code like concat('%', #{query.caseeNumber}, '%') or countList.casee_number like concat('%', #{query.caseeNumber}, '%'))
and countList.executed_name like concat('%', #{query.executedName}, '%')
and countList.actual_name like concat('%', #{query.actualName}, '%')
AND countList.start_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')

select * from ( select * from ( select p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_casee.*,p10_project_casee_re.actual_name as userName , p10_project.ins_id,p10_project.outles_id,p10_court.court_name,json_extract(p10_project.project_detail,'$.projectAmount') projectAmount from p10_project left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.project_id = p10_project.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id = p10_project_casee_re.casee_id left join p10_court on p10_court.court_id = p10_casee.court_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.`status` = 1000 and p10_casee.casee_type in (3010,3031) and json_extract(p10_project.project_detail,'$.projectAmount') = json_extract(p10_project.project_detail,'$.repaymentAmount') order by p10_project.project_id,p10_casee.start_time desc limit 999999999999 )casee GROUP BY casee.project_id )casee where casee.status not in (2,3)
and casee.ins_id = #{login.insId}
and casee.outles_id = #{login.outlesId}
and (casee.company_code like concat('%', #{query.caseeNumber}, '%') or casee.casee_number like concat('%', #{query.caseeNumber}, '%'))
and casee.executed_name like concat('%', #{query.executedName}, '%')
and casee.actual_name like concat('%', #{query.actualName}, '%')
AND casee.start_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')

select p10_subject.subject_id,p10_subject.name as subjectName,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_casee.*,p10_court.court_name,p10_project_casee_re.actual_name as userName from p10_casee_subject_re left join p10_casee on p10_casee_subject_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_behavior on p10_behavior.subject_id = p10_casee_subject_re.subject_id and p10_behavior.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_project_casee_re.project_id left join p10_subject on p10_subject.subject_id = p10_casee_subject_re.subject_id left join p10_court on p10_court.court_id = p10_casee.court_id where p10_project.del_flag = 0 and p10_project.status = 1000 and p10_casee.casee_type in (3010,3031) and p10_casee_subject_re.casee_personnel_type = 1 and p10_behavior.behavior_id is null and p10_casee.`status` = 1
and p10_project.ins_id = #{login.insId}
and p10_project.outles_id = #{login.outlesId}
and (p10_project.company_code like concat('%', #{query.caseeNumber}, '%') or p10_casee.casee_number like concat('%', #{query.caseeNumber}, '%'))
and p10_subject.name like concat('%', #{query.executedName}, '%')
and p10_project_casee_re.actual_name like concat('%', #{query.actualName}, '%')
AND p10_casee.start_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
